{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WPN824 |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/03/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12N034 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY3WPN824 |ic_id=4054A-WPN824 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2313A;AR2313A-00, B36513B, 0544, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160BTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S281632F-TC75 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2313A;AR2313A;AR2313A-00, B36513B, 0544, TAIWAN; |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ1, A46469.1, 0531 B0E, TW; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:0F:B5,00:14:6C |oui_eth=00:0F:B5,00:14:6C }} ''RangeMax Wireless Router''
[http://support.netgear.com/app/products/model/a_id/2628 Product page] Manuf. by Foxconn / Hon Hai / Ambit, model U12N034 Uses a smart antenna ('BeamFlex') system licenced from Video54 (now Ruckus Wireless). See SmallNetBuilder (below) for more information *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/24729-reviewwpn824 Original WPN824 review] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-features/30274-what-do-metamaterials-really-do-for-antennas 'What do metamaterials really do for antennas?'] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-features/30436-uh-oh-netgear-and-rayspans-metamaterial-antennas-not-that-new 'Uh Oh: Netgear and Rayspan's Metamaterials antennas now that new?'] ==Images== File:Netgear_WPN824v1_board_top.jpg|board top File:Netgear_WPN824v1_board_bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
